Sit down lunches begin promptly at 11:30 am. We serve the items as follows. No take-out meals (grab & go).   Each meal course ends when the next one begins. Please be prompt.   11:30 am Soup  11:45 am Salad  12:00 pm Main Meal  We also have Meals-On-Wheels for seniors (60+) who are physically or mentally disabled and unable to shop and/or prepare their own meals.
